list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"success"}},"error":{"type":"null"},"responseData":{"type":"object","properties":{"totalNum":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"10"}},"data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@id"}},"createTime":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer(1000000000000, 2000000000000)"}},"executor":{"type":"string","enum":["admin","sadmin","audit","administrator","tenant"]},"eventCategory":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer(1,11)"}},"eventObject":{"type":"string","enum":["系统登录","用户","个人信息","系统配置","许可证","告警"]},"eventType":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer(1,17)"}},"ip":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"@ip"}},"role":{"type":"number","mock":{"mock":"@integer(0,5)"}},"result":{"type":"string","enum":["成功","失败"]},"content":{"type":"string","mock":{"mock":"用户admin登录成功"}}}},"minItems":"10","maxItems":"30"}}}}}
